Just a quick question
How do I watch this?
more seeders, please.. i am up at 4.25% and can't download it anymore. :S

Fantastic torrent. Why can't there be more like this out there?!!

FaustSnake - Use a PC Software DVD player like Cyberlink PowerDVD, InterVideo WinDVD, etc and select "Open DVD File on HDD".
Select the Video_TS.ifo file and hit OK. It will then run as a normal DVD from your drive :)
